item.title: Transversing The Time Pyramids - Devoid of Joy
item.dc:creator: Kerfuffle
item.description:
This was an awesome listen! This kind of dark trashy stuff is what I live for. (i don’t mean trashy as bad, i mean in yourface and grotesque) Thanks for your passion, it’s very interesting. earned yourself a follower!

Read full topic

item.title: Transversing The Time Pyramids - Devoid of Joy
item.dc:creator: Devoid-of-joy
item.description:
@Mr_Mooo
Just gotta push the sonics. Those filters are more versatile than ya think, you just have to overcome some learned biases.
But I’m glad you enjoy it a small amount even if it’s not your cup of tea

item.title: Transversing The Time Pyramids - Devoid of Joy
item.dc:creator: Devoid-of-joy
item.description:
Thanks man that means a lot. I just try and create something completely different than anything else. I try to exclude all influences but it’s impossible really. It’s about the sound more than anything for me, I want it to be all encompassing and undeniably in the listeners face.

Read full topic
